trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to an <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> within an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Representa um elemento de extensibilidade adicionado a um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> dentro de um serviço Web XML.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class respresents an extensibility element in Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specific to HTTP.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe representa um elemento de extensibilidade no WSDL Web Services Description Language () específicas para HTTP.

trans-unit.source: It specifies the relative URL of an operation using as the base the location specified by an <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a URL relativa de uma operação usando como base para o local especificado por <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding>

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como especificar protocolos para XML Web services, consulte [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL, consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL relative to the location specified by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding"></xref>, within the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document, of the operation supported by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a URL relativo ao local especificado pelo <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding"> </xref>, dentro do Web Services Description Language (WSDL) de documento, da operação com suporte a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An unencoded string representing the relative path.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres sem codificação que representa o caminho relativo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").
